objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
objects.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey
objects.description: Parses a bundle key and returns a dictionary of the `bundleName` & `labelKey`

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument
objects.description: Replaces a single argument symbol with an argument value in a display label

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument_RichText
objects.description: Replaces a single argument symbol with an argument value in a display label according to an optional richText configuration

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument_RichText_InsertArgumentCdt
objects.description: Inserts the given argument as a richTextItem where applicable for the provided text type

objects.name: AS_CO_TYPE_Decimal
objects.description: Returns `type!{}Decimal` used for casting purposes

objects.name: AS_CO_TYPE_TextList
objects.description: Returns `type!{}Text?list` used for casting purposes

objects.name: AS_CO_TYPE_VariantList
objects.description: Returns `type!{}Variant?list` used for casting purposes

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_ContainsValueByField
objects.description: it's only used by `AS_CO_UT_Filter`.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer
objects.description: Do not call this rule directly, it's only used by `AS_CO_UT_Filter`.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Clause Set

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata
objects.description: Automatically sets the "auditing" fields on a CDT, including createdDatetime/createdBy/modifiedDatetime/modifiedBy/isActive/isDeleted

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Clause Set

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_compare
objects.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the content of the values match (regardless of type).

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel
objects.description: Retrieves a single label from the Common Objects bundle file

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
objects.description: Executes displayValue, but allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValueMultiple
objects.description: For each item in the values list, executes displayValue.  Allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_divide
objects.description: Divide with a default value to be used when 0 is the denominator

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
objects.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByMultipleFieldValuePairs
objects.description: More robust than filterCdtByMultipleFields rule. Works correctly with boolean types.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder
objects.description: Creates a formatted placeholder label for dropdowns.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
objects.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl
objects.description: Returns the URL of the site, terminating in /suite/

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable
objects.description: Use this to initialize a null or empty local variable of a specific type. Pass `type` to initialize as a specific type, or `typeOf` to initialize as the type of another variable.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Clause Set

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Clause Set

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isRecordTypeData
objects.description: Returns true if the passed data is of type record type

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
objects.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtByField
objects.description: Removes CDT indices where a match of a single value or list of values in a single field is found, if a list is passed, all matches are rejected

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields
objects.description: Returns an array of a CDTs fields. Note that this only works on Appian CDTs, not Dictionary or List of Variant

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
objects.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject
objects.description: Takes in either an array type or a primitive type and returns the singular type object, works for CDTs or primitive types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_safeLink
objects.description: Generic safe link component that gracefully handles a null URI

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortArray
objects.description: Sorts an array of primitive types (e.g. text, integers, dates)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct
objects.description: Sorts the distinct elements of an array of primitive types (e.g. text, integers, dates)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortCdt
objects.description: Sorts a CDT, dictionary, or complex type.  Pass nullsFirst to explicitly sort nulls first or last.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortCdtBySecondaryArray
objects.description: Returns a CDT so that one of its fields matches the sort of the array

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortCdtDistinct
objects.description: Sorts distinct elements of a CDT by the given field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
objects.description: Returns true if the two input types match

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields
objects.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, with an optional input for indices

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs
objects.description: Allows passing field-value pairs to handle for use cases where you have to set newValues as arrays

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_urlForRecord
objects.description: Returns the url for a record for use in a safe link

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_userSafeLink
objects.description: Generic safe link to a user record

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
objects.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_sortCdtBySecondaryArray_handler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_sortCdtBySecondaryArray`

objects.name: AS_CO_VD_numberValidation
objects.description: Performs minimum and maximum size validation on an integer value. Returns a validation message if any provided size constraints are violated.

objects.name: AS_CO_VD_textValidation
objects.description: Performs minimum and maximum length validation on a text value. Returns a validation message if any provided length constraints are violated. Allows for custom validation messages.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildQuestionCategories_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Given a list of template question categories, builds a list of question categories by mapping the fields

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildQuestionPrecedentSets_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Given a list of QuestionPrecedentsSet_Template types, returns a list of QuestionPrecedentSets.  QuestionId_precedent in the QuestinPrecedents are populated based upon the order of the question provided, as this is how they are set in process upon questionnaire creation after the initial question saves.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildQuestionnaire_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Given a questionnaire template, builds a runtime questionnaire

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildQuestions_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Given a template question, builds a question by mapping the fields

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildResponseRequirements_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Builds response requirements from template responses

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildResponses_RuntimeFromTemplate
objects.description: Builds responses from template responses

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateCompletionPercentage
objects.description: Given a set of question metadata, calculates the questionnaire completion percentage

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateFieldShowWhenMetadata
objects.description: Rule used to calculate the showWhen metadata for a field of a question

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionFulfilledMetadata
objects.description: Rule used to calculate the fulfillment metadata for a question and its fields

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionMetadata
objects.description: Calculates the relevant pieces of question metadata for the passed questions

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionMetadata_Group
objects.description: Calculates the relevant pieces of question metadata for a set of questions in a group

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionMetadata_Page
objects.description: Calculates the relevant pieces of question metadata for a set of questions on page

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionRequiredAndValidMetadata
objects.description: Rule used to calculate the required and valid metadata for a question and its fields

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionShowWhenMetadata
objects.description: Rule used to calculate the showWhen metadata for a question and its fields

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_clearHiddenResponses
objects.description: Rule to clear the responses of a question based on the responses its dependent questions

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_evaluateQuestionPrecedent
objects.description: Given a question precedent and the questionnaire to which is belongs, evaluates whether or not the the question precedent is fulfilled, returning a boolean.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_evaluateQuestionPrecedentSet
objects.description: Given a questionPrecedentSet and the corresponding questionnaire, returns a boolean evaluation of the questionPrecedentSet.  If the set is null, returns true.  If the set has no criteria (empty sets/precedents), returns false, as that means this precedent can never be fulfilled.  Otherwise, evaluates the conditions for the precedents  and further nested precedent sets based upon the operator to determine a boolean result.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_fieldTypes
objects.description: Returns the fieldList for the Question Type of the provided Question

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_filterToResponsesForQuestionByFieldKey
objects.description: Given a question and a field key, filters to the responses for that key

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_fulfilled
objects.description: Rule used to determine if a question has been fulfilled

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_questionMetadata
objects.description: Given a question, returns the appropriate metadata

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_required
objects.description:
Given a question, the field to be required or not, and the questions that are potentially relevant to the determination, determines if the field should be required.  If fieldKey is null, the determination applies to the question as a whole.

A question as a whole can only be required or not based upon responses to other questions in its group.
An individual field within a question can only be required or not based upon the responses to other fields within that question.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_responseRequirementMetadata
objects.description: Given a response requirement, returns a reference to the appropriate set of metadata

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_showWhen
objects.description:
Given a question, the field to be shown, and the questions that are potentially relevant to the determination, determines if the field should be displayed.  If fieldKey is null, the determination applies to the question as a whole.

A question as a whole can only be displayed or not based upon responses to other questions in its group.
An individual field within a question can only be displayed or not based upon the responses to other fields within that question.

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_validate
objects.description: Validates a Question based upon its responses and Question Type
